Title: Materia Medica
Description:
Alright, Ken-Ken pretty sure he knows what wrong with pandaren! Got old, old hozen remedy that do the trick.

Need to mix honey, fish oil, and salt. Ken-Ken saw lots of beehives in the trees around town, and there must be fish left in the dry ponds.

That just leave salt... Mei might know where we can find some.
ObjectivesText: Gather 4 Chunks of Honeycomb, 4 Slick Mudfish, and 4 Salty Cores from Zhu Province.
CompletionText: Can't believe Ken-Ken did not think of this sooner. It's the ONE thing that can ruin his day...
RewardText:
Pandaren got a case of the spooky-dooks!

Dooks get scared sometimes, don't wanna come out. Poor, fluffy mopey-dopes must be ready to explode by now!

This just the thing to bring 'em out. That make pandaren happy for sure!

Just like ol' gramma used to say: can't THROW if can't GO!
